message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be very valuable for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85.  What do you think?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I could come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that.  It's a really good price for what you're getting.
Alice,  $110 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $95, but that's my final offer.  If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to go with another seller.
